name: Terra's Trip
description: A twine story about a girl who takes a little trip through Saturn's moons. 15K words, somehow. This was made for Nadia Nova's Trans Gal Jam 2! I wanted to make something a bit lighthearted for a change, and I hope y'all like it, even if I did rush it a little in the end. Please enjoy and do chip in if you can afford it. I'd love to make more of these.
